definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: The Red Sea was divided and congealed or was frozen in place until God released the Sea again.
sentences.chinese: 紅海的海水便分開並且凝固住直到上帝讓海水複合。

sentences.english: They left the Red Sea and camped in the Desert of Sin.
sentences.chinese: 從紅海邊起行，安營在汛的曠野。

sentences.english: 13 to him who divided the Red Sea asunder His love endures forever.
sentences.chinese: 稱謝那分裂紅海的，因他的慈愛永遠長存。

sentences.english: To him which divided the Red sea into parts: for his mercy endureth for ever
sentences.chinese: 稱謝那分裂紅海的，因他的慈愛永遠長存。

sentences.english: In recent years people had taken to calling this coast the Red Sea Riviera.
sentences.chinese: 最近幾年，人們開始將這片海岸稱作紅海的蔚藍海岸。

sentences.english: The Gulf of Suez and the Gulf of Aqaba extend from the Red Sea toward the Mediterranean.
sentences.chinese: 在蘇伊士灣和亞喀巴灣延伸從紅海向地中海。

sentences.english: Thou didst walk through the sea with thine horses, through the heap of great waters.
sentences.chinese: 你乘馬踐踏紅海，就是踐踏洶湧的大水。

sentences.english: The Red Sea divides Asia from Africa.
sentences.chinese: 紅海把亞洲和非洲分開。

sentences.english: And they removed from the Red sea， and encamped in the wilderness of Sin.
sentences.chinese: 從紅海邊起行，安營在汛的曠野。

sentences.english: And they journeyed from mount Hor by the way of the Red sea, to compass the land of Edom: and the soul of the people was much discouraged because of the way.
sentences.chinese: 他們從何珥山起行，往紅海那條路走，要繞過以東地。

sentences.english: And they removed from Elim, and encamped by the Red sea.
sentences.chinese: 從以琳起行，安營在紅海邊。

sentences.english: And they departed from Tahath, and pitched at Tarah.
sentences.chinese: 他們從以琳起行，來到紅海岸邊，就在那裏紮營。

sentences.english: He says the science of fluids in motion can explain the parting of the Red Sea.
sentences.chinese: 他指出流體運動學可以解釋紅海的分離。

sentences.english: Mating is as hard as the cleaving of the waters of the Red Sea.
sentences.chinese: 找對象之難，有如將紅海之水劈開一般。

sentences.english: The Jieshi bay and Honghai Bay.

definition: a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
Hengchun Peninsula in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], the southernmost point of Taiwan
Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

definition: the New World/the Americas as opposed to the Old World 舊大陸|旧大陆[jiu4 da4 lu4] or Eurasia
Iwate prefecture in the north of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]
